items.title: 1 Growth Stock Down 87% to Buy Right Now
items.description: Looking for growth stocks at bargain prices? This media-streaming stock's 87% decline spells opportunity, and not in a subtle way.

items.title: 1 Unstoppable Vanguard Index Fund to Confidently Buy During the S&P 500 Correction
items.author: Anthony Di Pizio
items.description: The S&P 500 index, which tracks 500 major U.S. companies, has fallen 12.5% from its all-time high due to global trade tensions. However, history suggests the index will eventually recover, making the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF a potential buy during the correction.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article recommends the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF as a potential buy during the recent market correction, citing its low expense ratio and ability to track the performance of the S&P 500 index.

The article mentions that Apple, along with Microsoft and Nvidia, are the three largest companies in the S&P 500's information technology sector, which makes up 29.3% of the index. The article suggests these companies are likely to continue creating value for investors in the future.
